Mr. HILL of Arkansas. Madam Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and  pass the bill (H.R. 5616) to amend title 31, United States Code, to  require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue $2.50  numismatic coins and $2.50 circulating coins, and for other purposes,  as amended.
